languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс ван Калокс кивает вам.{/n} "Наше совместное странствие подошло к концу. Последний рывок — и тайнам Простора и Калькасара будет положен конец. Скорее бы — мне надоела пелена секретности, которой скрывали истину даже от меня".

{n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс ван Калокс кивает вам.{/n} "Наше совместное странствие подошло к концу. Последний рывок — и тайнам Простора и Калькасара будет положен конец. Скорее бы — мне надоела пелена секретности, которой скрывали истину даже от меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスはこちらを見てうなずく。{/n}「我らの旅はまもなく終わります。あと一息でエクスパンスの秘密とカルカサルが眠りにつくことでしょう。待ちきれませんね…我から真実を隠してきた機密という名の覆いにはうんざりですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスはこちらを見てうなずく。{/n}「我らの旅はまもなく終わります。あと一息でエクスパンスの秘密とカルカサルが眠りにつくことでしょう。待ちきれませんね…我から真実を隠してきた機密という名の覆いにはうんざりですよ」

languages.text: {n}海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯朝你点了点头。{/n}“我们的旅程终于走到尽头了。只要最后这步，科罗努斯扩区和卡尔卡扎的秘密就将大白于天下。我简直迫不及待了——我已经厌倦了那些连我都不知道的秘密。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯朝你点了点头。{/n}“我们的旅程终于走到尽头了。只要最后这步，科罗努斯扩区和卡尔卡扎的秘密就将大白于天下。我简直迫不及待了——我已经厌倦了那些连我都不知道的秘密。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nickt dir zu.{/n} "Unsere gemeinsame Reise nähert sich ihrem Ende. Noch eine letzte Anstrengung und die Geheimnisse der Ausdehnung und Calcazars werden zur Ruhe gebettet. Ich kann es kaum erwarten — ich bin den Schleier der Geheimnisse leider, der die Wahrheit selbst vor mir verborgen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nickt dir zu.{/n} "Unsere gemeinsame Reise nähert sich ihrem Ende. Noch eine letzte Anstrengung und die Geheimnisse der Ausdehnung und Calcazars werden zur Ruhe gebettet. Ich kann es kaum erwarten — ich bin den Schleier der Geheimnisse leider, der die Wahrheit selbst vor mir verborgen hat."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox asiente.{/n} «Nuestro viaje juntos toca a su fin. Un último empujón y los secretos de la Extensión y Calcazar saldrán a la luz. Tengo ganas, estoy cansado de esta mortaja de secretos que me oculta incluso a mí la verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox asiente.{/n} «Nuestro viaje juntos toca a su fin. Un último empujón y los secretos de la Extensión y Calcazar saldrán a la luz. Tengo ganas, estoy cansado de esta mortaja de secretos que me oculta incluso a mí la verdad».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox vous adresse un hochement de tête.{/n} « Nous approchons de la fin de notre voyage ensemble. Un dernier effort et nous percerons enfin les secrets des Étendues et de Calcazar. J'ai hâte de lever le voile de mystère qui dissimule la vérité, même à mes propres yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox vous adresse un hochement de tête.{/n} « Nous approchons de la fin de notre voyage ensemble. Un dernier effort et nous percerons enfin les secrets des Étendues et de Calcazar. J'ai hâte de lever le voile de mystère qui dissimule la vérité, même à mes propres yeux. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox başını eğiyor.{/n} "Yolculuğumuz sona ermek üzere. Son bir gayret sergileyeceğiz ve he Enginlik'in hem de Calcazar'ın sırları sonsuzluğa gömülecek. Sabırsızlanıyorum. Benden bile saklanan gerçeğin meydana getirdiği bu gizem örtüsünden artık yoruldum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox nods to you.{/n} "Our journey together approaches its end. One last push and the secrets of the Expanse and Calcazar will be laid to rest. I can't wait — I'm tired of the shroud of secrecy that has hidden the truth even from me."
